title: Anonymous
description: Nice girls don’t have affairs- even anonymously.  For five years, Reese’s husband, Adam, has been everything she’s ever wanted: loving, protective, and the kind of husband other women wish for. Life is perfect. When Adam’s career takes off— Reese is left feeling more like a forgotten roommate than his lover. Feeling lost, confused, and more than a little down on herself, Reese turns to an unlikely source—an anonymous doctor with an internet sex blog. At first the dirty doctor is just a sexy distraction, but as their communication develops, so does their relationship. There’s no harm in an anonymous arrangement if both parties understand the rules… but one decision can change everything.
author: Dusty Dae
